Icedragon/Fury/Blade Runner/Depth Charge/Tigerhawk/Angel Prime/Silverbolt



they all flew up infront of the Giant robot [I can't spell his name.]


Tigerhawk:



"you have caused to much damage. now it is time for you to leave."


Tigerhawk causes three bolts of lighting at the Giant Robot.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Icedragon starts firing sharp iceicles at him.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Blade Runner fires two rockets at him.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Depth Charge fires two ion disks at him.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Silverbolt throws two missles at him.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



Angel Prime:




"you taken this way to far."



he forms another terror force and flys over the Giants robots head and 
throws it downward at him.
